entry.title: ASSET - Error AIST 009
entry.content:
Hi, Support SAP

We are trying to change the cost center and the standard shows “Profit center is not unique (01ADMIN/06PRODUT)” – Error AIST009.

I see the note 3399016 and change the company status, but don´t works.

In the attached document has the steps to simulate the problem.

Can I help us, please.

Best regards.

Rose Chaves.

entry.title: Variant configuration- Separate Sales order line item
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Our customer is using variant configuration ( LO-VC) for their finished products. These materials have their BOM's. At times the subcomponents of this BOM are not all available in one plant where the Sales order is created.  Their requirement is to allow the items to be delivered from another plant and on a separate delivery date - independent of the other materials from the KMAT material and its BOM. Currently they delete such line items from the sales order and add a separate line item for the individual material with a different plant on the sales order.

Is there a function to be able to force a line on a sales order based on a chosen option in VC?

We are on S/4HANA On Premise Release 2022- FPS ( 05/2023). 

Any suggestion or guidance is welcome.

Thanks,

Kartik Shah

entry.title: provide the logic behind calculating the exchange rate of EUR to USD
entry.content:
Dear Team,

I am experiencing an issue with the exchange rate in the SAP billing process. The exchange rate for EUR to USD is being picked up at the billing line-item level as 1.08600. However, the exchange rate being maintained in the OB08 config (t-code) on differs from this rate.

Could you provide the logic behind calculating the exchange rate of EUR to USD as 1.08600? I have attached a snapshot of the conditional exchange rate for your reference.

Invoice number:

entry.title: Asset APC value in AR02 report double
entry.content:
Asset APC value coming wrong 

Asset no 3200000014 value in AR02 report double 2100000.00 but in AR03 report it is 1050000.00 which is match with AW01N report .

may i know the reason why this difference appearing .

if the asset is procure in current fiscal year date - 01.04.2025 . but other asset coming correct if the asset is from previous year .

entry.title: Batch Derivation and Co-Product
entry.content:
hello

I"m using batch derivation for Process order. I have the following BOM with Characterics C1 to be derived from components to PF and co-product

Head PF  qtity = 100

Item

Component C1  qtity = 100  carac C1 = 001

Co product  SF1 qtity =  - 100

 

When I make process order confirmation batch derication is working for PF  ( Cara C1 is updated with value 001). But Batch derivation is not working for Co-product. We expected to have Carac C1 equal to 001 for coproduct SF1

entry.title: Is there a S/4HANA cloud test/demo/development system for partners including sample data like IDES?
entry.content:
Hi folks,

This might be a noob question, but I cannot find an answer to it on the web and reaching out to SAP about only gives me e-mail after e-mail of links that I already found myself and that do not answer my question. So, maybe the community can help!?

Here is what I am looking for: we want to get access to a cloud based SAP ERP environment that allows us to develop a ABAP report and create a transport for it (SE38, SE93, SE10, SE80, STMS, ...). To be able to develop and test the program, the system needs to be prefilled with a "meaningful" amount of data in the MM and PP area, such as material master data, business partner master data, BOMs, sales orders, invoices, purchase orders, and so on. I do not have time to create all that data in a substantial amount myself. And we do not have a SAP system for migration or a data set that we could import. I formerly had access to an on-prem R/3 installation with the IDES (internet demonstration and evaluation system) data. Basically, we are looking for something similar, but a cloud-based offering with development rights. 2 or 3 named users would be sufficient. 

So the question is, is there such an offer by SAP and if so, where can I find it. Ohh, btw, we are SAP partners, so this can also be a partner offering.

Thank you
Thomas

entry.title: Essential transfer parameters are missing in record: 000001 message posting a reservation
entry.content:
Unable to posts Goods issue against a reservation that was generated from a WO

  1. Create WO include Stock material which will create a reservation
  2. Ensure that there is enough stock to meet reservation quantity
  3. Use Posts Goods Issue app against reservation to issue material
  4. Error message appears.

Any advice?

entry.title: Revoking of Withholding Tax Rounding Off Rule
entry.content:
Hi,

We have enabled the Rounding off rule for the Withholding Tax Type for all our Company Codes since April 2024.

Now, it has been decided to revoke this rounding-off rule for all company codes.

Kindly advise whether there will be any issue in revoking the rounding off rule in the middle of the financial year DIGITS-26, and its impact on entries that were posted already in earlier periods and the fiscal year.

entry.content: We are getting a dump in tcode WPS1 when trying to create an Order for Revision based on Notification .Dump details attached.Need to know if note 3296434 - Dump while creating Maintenance Order with reference from SD Quotation  is applicable.Else what is the solution

entry.title: Accounting Indicator missing in Manage Substitution and Validation Rules For Service
entry.content:
Hello, 

We have a requirement to determine the profit center based on accounting indicator and item category. Accounting indicator is missing in Precondition. Is there any note which can add Accounting Indicator (From Service Order and Service Confirmation of New S4hana Service) to the pre condition? Business will update the Accounting Indicator during service confirmation to determine the correct profit center.

 

Thanks 

Bidhu

entry.title: upgrade from ECC to S4/HANA T-Code: SU3 parameters can't find WMMB_MATRIX_ALV
entry.content:
Dear Support team,

For sales order size conversion, we can add user parameter under transaction SU3: WMMB_MATRIX_ALV in ECC

But I can"t find WMMB_MATRIX_ALV in S4/HANA. Please kindly advise how to fix this. Thanks a lot.

entry.title: Need SAP Mentor
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

I have 12 years of experience in SAP Basis Profile, I am based out of India.

At this point in my career I desperately need a Guide or Mentor who can help me navigate towards my passion and help with upgrading myself. I am active on SAP Learning and on my job, but it doesn't feel enough to me, I want to be doing more and excelling in my career, and I need guidance and help to reach to the top.

Please help me find my Mentor. Also joining @SAP is my dream. I am surely not here for an average job and average life. I want to do more, be more, help companies, help myself excel.

Thanks and Regards,

Laxmi Maurya

SAP Basis Administrator
